items.name: Component_Live2D
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Component_Live2D
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Component_Live2D extends gs.Component
    ###*
    * A Live2D component which allows a game-object to become a animated
    * Live2D character.
    *
    * @module vn
    * @class Component_Live2D
    * @extends gs.Component
    * @memberof vn
    * @constructor
    ###
    constructor: ->
        super
        
        ###*
        * The Live2D graphics object.
        * @property l2dObject
        * @type gs.Live2DObject
        * @readOnly
        ###
        @l2dObject = null
        
        ###*
        * The character's Live2D motion. Set name-property to an empty string
        * to disable motion and use a generated default idle-motion.
        * @property motion
        * @type gs.Live2DMotion
        * @default { name: "", loop: yes }
        ###
        @motion = name: "", loop: yes
        
        ###*
        * The character's Live2D motion-group. Can be null
        * @property motionGroup
        * @type gs.Live2DMotionGroup
        * @default null
        ###
        @motionGroup = null
        
        ###*
        * The character's Live2D expression. Set name-property to an empty string
        * to use default expression.
        * @property expression
        * @type gs.Live2DExpression
        * @default { name: "" }
        ###
        @expression = name: ""
        
        ###*
        * @property talkingDuration
        * @type number
        * @protected
        ###
        @talkingDuration = 1
        
        ###*
        * @property talkingStep
        * @type number
        * @protected
        ###
        @talkingStep = 0
        
        ###*
        * @property talkingStep
        * @type number[]
        * @protected
        ###
        @talkingSteps = [0, 0.5, 1]
        
    ###*
    * Disposes the component and Live2D object.
    *
    * @method dispose
    ###
    dispose: ->
        super
        
        @l2dObject.dispose()
        
    ###*
    * Called if this object instance is restored from a data-bundle. It can be used
    * re-assign event-handler, anonymous functions, etc.
    * 
    * @method onDataBundleRestore.
    * @param Object data - The data-bundle
    * @param gs.ObjectCodecContext context - The codec-context.
    ###
    onDataBundleRestore: (data, context) ->
        @expression = name: ""
        @motion = name: "", loop: yes
        @motionGroup = null
        
        @updateMotion()
        @updateExpression()
        @updateMotionGroup()
     
    ###*
    * Setup the Live2D component. This method is automatically called by the
    * system.
    * @method setup
    ###
    setup: ->
        @l2dObject = new gs.Live2DObject()
        
    ###*
    * Updates the character's Live2D motion.
    *
    * @method updateMotion
    ###          
    updateMotion: ->
        if @motion != @object.motion
            @motion = @object.motion
            if @motion.name
                @l2dObject.playMotion(@motion.name, @motion.fadeInTime)
                @l2dObject.loopMotion = @motion.loop
    
    ###*
    * Updates the character's Live2D motion-group.
    *
    * @method updateMotionGroup
    ###          
    updateMotionGroup: ->
        if @motionGroup != @object.motionGroup
            @motionGroup = @object.motionGroup
            if @motionGroup?.name
                @l2dObject.playMotionGroup(@motionGroup.name, @motionGroup.playType)
                @l2dObject.loopMotion = @motionGroup.loop
    
    ###*
    * Updates the character's Live2D expression.
    *
    * @method updateExpression
    ###              
    updateExpression: ->
        if @expression.name != @object.expression.name
            @expression = @object.expression
            @l2dObject.setExpression(@expression.name, @expression.fadeInTime)
            
    ###*
    * Updates the Live2D object properties from the game object properties.
    *
    * @method updateProperties
    ###        
    updateProperties: ->
        @l2dObject.model = @object.model
        @object.dstRect.width = @l2dObject.width
        @object.dstRect.height = @l2dObject.height
        
        @l2dObject.x = @object.dstRect.x + @object.offset.x
        @l2dObject.y = @object.dstRect.y + @object.offset.y
        @l2dObject.z = @object.zIndex
        @l2dObject.visible = @object.visible
        @l2dObject.opacity = @object.opacity
        @l2dObject.zoomX = @object.zoom.x
        @l2dObject.zoomY = @object.zoom.y
        @l2dObject.anchor.x = @object.anchor.x
        @l2dObject.anchor.y = @object.anchor.y
        @l2dObject.angle = @object.angle
        @l2dObject.tone = @object.tone
        @l2dObject.color = @object.color
        
    ###*
    * Updates the optional Live2D object properties from the game object properties.
    *
    * @method updateOptionalProperties
    ###    
    updateOptionalProperties: ->
        if @object.viewport?
            @l2dObject.viewport = @object.viewport
        if @object.effects?
            @l2dObject.effects = @object.effects
            
    ###*
    * Updates the Live2D object and its talking-animation.
    *
    * @method update
    ###   
    update: ->
        if @object.model? and not @object.model.initialized
            @object.model.initialize()
            
        @updateProperties()
        @updateMotion()
        @updateMotionGroup()
        @updateExpression()
        @updateOptionalProperties()
        @updateTalking()
    
    ###*
    * Updates the Live2D character's talking-animation.
    *
    * @method update
    ###       
    updateTalking: ->
        step = 0
        if @object.talking
            @l2dObject.talking = yes
            if AudioManager.voice?
                @l2dObject.talkingVolume = (AudioManager.voice.averageVolume || 0) / 100
            else
                @talkingDuration--
                if @talkingDuration <= 0
                    while @talkingStep == step
                        step = Math.round(Math.random() * 2)
                    @talkingDuration = 5
                    @talkingStep = step
                    @l2dObject.talkingVolume = @talkingSteps[step]
        else
            @l2dObject.talking = no
 
vn.Component_Live2D = Component_Live2D       
gs.Component_Live2D = Component_Live2D # Deprecated
